items.name: dashscrop-ai-provider
items.title: Dashscrop ai provider for ai sdk
items.description: Set up dashscrop ai provider for ai sdk. Add model provider to lib. Build with ai-sdk/openai-compatible

items.name: sealos-ai-provider
items.title: Sealos AI provider for ai sdk
items.description: Set up Sealos AI provider for ai sdk. Add model provider to lib. Build with ai-sdk/openai-compatible

items.name: nextjs-generate-text-api-and-component-for-dashscrop-ai-provider
items.title: NextJS Text Generation API and Component with Dashscope AI Integration
items.description: A basic implementation of text generation functionality using Dashscope AI provider. Includes both API endpoint and React component for seamless integration with NextJS applications. Built with Vercel AI SDK.

items.name: nextjs-chat-bot-component-and-api
items.title: NextJS Chat Bot Component with AI Integration
items.description: A comprehensive chat bot implementation with both UI component and API endpoint. Built with Vercel AI SDK for seamless integration with NextJS applications.

items.name: nextjs-chat-bot-with-middleware
items.title: NextJS Chat Bot with LLM Middleware
items.description: An advanced chat bot implementation with LLM middleware support. Includes UI component, API endpoint, and middleware handlers for enhanced AI interactions. Built with Vercel AI SDK.

items.name: nextjs-object-generation-notification
items.title: NextJS Object Generation Notification Component
items.description: A component for generating structured notification objects using AI. Includes schema definition, UI component, and API endpoint. Built with Vercel AI SDK's object generation feature.
